text: Vidyodaya PU College is a pre-university college in Tumkur, Karnataka, India.Retrieved from Google Maps https://www.google.com/maps/place/Deeksha,+Gandhi+Nagar,+Tumakuru/@13.337926,77.097523,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0xda340c1f1b27c324!8m2!3d13.337926!4d77.097523?hl=en- GB It is affiliated to Karnataka Pre-University Education Board.Retrieved from [Department of Pre University Education, Karnataka] http://pue.kar.nic.in/PUE/PDF_files/colleges/UU.pdf It is located at B.H.Road, Gandhi Nagar. ==Streams offered== The College offers courses in the below mentioned Commerce streams 1\. CEBA - Computer Science, Economics, Business Studies, Accountancy. 2\. SEBA - Statistics, Economics, Business Studies, Accountancy ==References== Category:Pre University colleges in Karnataka Category:Schools in Tumkur district
title: Vidyodaya PU College
